description:
```Duties```

- Identify and develop new business opportunities through strategic planning and market research

- Build and maintain relationships with potential clients

- Ability to work well alone

- Conduct sales presentations and negotiate contracts with clients

- Collaborate with internal teams to develop and implement business development strategies

- Manage projects and ensure timely delivery of products or services to clients

- Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities to identify potential business opportunities

```Experience```

- Proven experience in business development, sales, or related field

- Proficient in strategic planning and market analysis

- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

- Ability to effectively negotiate and close deals

- Strong project management skills

This is an exciting opportunity for a motivated individual who is passionate about business development. As a Business Development Consultant, you will play a key role in driving the growth of our company by identifying new business opportunities, building relationships with clients, and implementing effective strategies. We offer competitive compensation, and a flexible and supportive work environment. If you are a results-driven professional with a strong sales background and a knack for strategic planning, we would love to hear from you.

Please note that only qualified candidates will be contacted for further consideration.

Job Type: Contract

Pay: $60,138.00 - $66,715.00 per year

Benefits:
• Flexible schedule

Schedule:
• Choose your own hours

Supplemental pay types:
• Bonus opportunities
• Commission pay

People with a criminal record are encouraged to apply

Work Location: Hybrid remote in Dallas, TX 75219
